ABOUT US

Comex India is a professional manufacturer which design, develop, and manufacture Slurry Separation Plant for slurry TBM and tunnels, micro-tunnels projects

Comex India is the Indian partner of Comex(BJ) Mechanical & Electronic Equipment Co. Ltd. One stop solution of complete slurry handling needs from design to commissioning. We are specialized manufacturer of filter presses, having obtained both ISO 9001:2000 quality certificate and ISO 14001:2004 environment certificate. Comex has researched and developed systematic equipments applicable to solid-liquid filtration field.

OUR PRODUCTS

Slurry Treatment Plant for Tunnel Boring Machine

Clay-slurry separator

When clay is treated by using traditional process, slag water content is really high and uneasy to transport, which easily lead to environmental pollution.

Dewatering screen

Dewatering screen is divided into single stage dewatering screen and second stage dewatering screen in single and double layer.

Coarse screen

Adopts highly frequency vibrator of famous international brand, are under variable frequency control.

Vibrating Screen

Achieve self-synchronizing to demand various processing equipment as a multiple stage combination.

Slurry Handling equipment

The slurry pump is a heavily built pump with a body and cover featuring metal liners made of high chromium wear-resistant alloys. These features are useful for reducing operating costs. The pump's flow passage components have a long service life, offering low operating costs, stable and reliable performance, and high production output.

The need for mud preparation and conditioning

Mud water blanced shield machine is widely used due to its advantages like good construction quality, high efficiency, advanced technology and safety & reliability.

Quality mud slurry preparation and conditioning method

Producing quality mud slurry calls for very high slurry preparation material, such as clay. It is a must to use bentonitic as main slurry preparation material which is small for sand content, water loss rate and gravity and high slurry producing capacity and colloid rate.

Reasonable configuration of slurry preparation facility

A well configuration of slurry preparation facility provides another important method to supply quality mud slurry for shield machine construction.

Mud slurry conditioning method

Geological conditions influence significantly shield machine construction. It is a must to condition old slurry frequently.

Vertical plate type filter press machine

The COM series filter presses produced by our company have been widely used in the coal preparation(beneficiation)plant for clean and tailing coal dewatering. Other users are metal preparation plants for concentrate and tailing of Aluminium, Copper, Iron ore mines, and others.

Pressure filter is made from European Technology with Dual piston triangular crank Mechanism.

The filter features automatic control by PLC, ensuring efficient and easy operation of all its functions. It guarantees stable running with its simple structure and compact size. The easy installation process eliminates the need for bolting on the ground, allowing for the installation of weight cells to measure moisture with maximum precision

Comex manufacture pressure plates with 100 percent carbon steel and the main components are from Europe as follows:

Electromagnetic reversing valve- Germany(ARGO-HYTOS).

Hydraulic valve- Italy(Atos).

Seals- Germany (DICHTOMATIK).

Accumulator- Italy (FOX).

Electronic devices- Germany (Schneider).

Press Filter Main Features:

Lowest cycle time. Standard 12 min per cycle.

Highest availability over 97%.

Low operating cost. Below 0.5 usd/ton of dry cake produced.

Long service life. Estimated over 20 years.

Comex technology and quality occupy a leading position in the mining and public words industry.

It's high reliability, low operating cost, and excellent after-sales service have won unanimous praise and favor from customers. Comex press filters operate with the lowest energy cost in the market, making its investment return one of the fastest known. Filter Plates are made with Carbon Steel for more than 20 years of life.

With good reputation until now, Comex product APN series filter press is honored to get authentication of ISO 9001:2008 Quality Certification System
